name: 3D Faux Mink Butterfl'eye Half Eyelashes
ingredients: Synthetic Fibers On A Cotton Lash Band.
how_to_use: Suggested Usage:.-Apply a light coat of mascara to your natural lashes, allow to dry.                                                                                       -Gently lift lash band away from the tray, never pulling on the lash hairs themselves.                                                                                                                                                                                      -Apply a thin layer of lash adhesive to lash band, allow to dry for 30 seconds.                                                                                                                                                                                       -Once adhesive is tacky, position lash toward the outer end of your eye to create an accentuated look..-Finish with using a lash curler to help fuse natural lashes and half lash together.

shades.shade_descriptor: round lash, complementary to all eye shapes
flare lash, complementary to all eye shapes
